reviewText: One of the best TV Turkish serial to understand modern day crime interwoven with family values and loyalty

The most exciting series I have seen in a long time!
Also up to all hours watch season 1. When will we b able to c the rest of the series. And the lead actor is the most handsome man I have ever seen and I am 82 yrs old ha ha.
It's just awesome and I am addicted to it, I need season 2

I DISCOVERED THESE TURKISH TV SERIES BY CHANCE AND IT HAS BEEN THE MOST REWARDING SERIES I HAVE SEEN IN A LONG TIME.  I STAYED UP UNTIL 3-4 AM EVERY DAY UNTIL I FINISHED THE VERSION SHOWN ON NETFLIX.  I KNOW THERE ARE MANY MORE EPISODES BEFORE THE ENDING.  NETFLIX CANNOT LEAVE ITS CUSTOMERS IN LIMBO, NOT KNOWING IF I'LL EVER BE ABLE TO VIEW THE REST.  IF ANYONE KNOWS HOW I CAN GET A HOLD OF THESE DVDs, I WOULD BE MOST APPRECIATIVE.  I AM A RESIDENT OF THE USA AND WOULD LIKE WITH ENGLISH OR SPANISH SUBTITLES; PLEASE..................!!!!! MANY THANKS!
